source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, wide shot of a scenic river landscape. A wide, blue river with a noticeable current flows through the center of the frame, its banks broad and covered in gray stones and pebbles. In the background, lush green hills and mountains rise against a bright blue sky filled with large, white, puffy clouds.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a static, wide shot of a scenic river landscape. A wide, blue river with a noticeable current flows through the center of the frame, its banks broad and covered in gray stones and pebbles. In the background, lush green hills and mountains rise against a bright blue sky filled with large, white, puffy clouds.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a small boat moves slowly across the river, creating ripples in the water.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a static, wide shot of a scenic river landscape. A wide, blue river with a noticeable current flows through the center of the frame, its banks broad and covered in gray stones and pebbles. A small boat moves slowly across the river, creating ripples in the water. In the background, lush green hills and mountains rise against a bright blue sky filled with large, white, puffy clouds.
